item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello everyone! This is the very first article in my blog. Very generic title, I know, no articles since I open the blog and I was thinking practice my English with some of them (probably, some in Spanish). And yes, here is the place that a “throw all my rubbish”, okno. I’ll write about all: Personal things, business, engineering, etc. Meanwhile, I’m thinking how to deal with all of my projects (personal and professional), I’ll be honest, I don’t have the time.
